product_name: Fritschi Diamir Vipec 12 Randonee Bindings with 108mm Brakes - 2014/2015
long_description: Simpler to use than the original version, the new Vipec 12 builds on the success of the first backcountry binding to combine low weight of a tech binding with DIN safety release of an alpine binding.
short_description: Simpler to use than the original version, the new Vipec 12 builds on the success of the first backcountry binding to combine low weight of a tech binding with DIN safety release of an alpine binding.
